name: How long can you survive!
description:
You need to survive in the ENORMOUS storm of self-bomer, challenge yourself and see how long can you survive!! (Brackey's tutorial helps me making this game, subscribe him at https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys if you are a game developer and love Unity, too!!!)

IMPORTANT: When you falls out of the edge, you will lose 30 HP and spawn at the nearerst spawn point, you won't die so DONT PANIC.

When the self-bomers touch you, their eyes become red and no sooner they will EXPLODE!!! Spreading out deadly spores and kill you.

WASD to control movements

Space to jump

Click and Rotate your mouth to shoot
